response.answer_text: What is an encyclopedia? What is an internet search engine? If you know how to find the answers to these two questions, I’m positive you know to find the answer to your question without troubling a human being to take the time to answer it for you. Nota Bene: Some might say I’m not being nice. Actually, I’m being more than nice. I’m taking the time to teach you how to approach a certain type of information you want to know more about. Have a Nice Day!
